英文法規名稱: Fee Charging Standards of Certificate of Telecommunications
中文法規名稱: 電信工程業證照費收費標準
沿革內容: 1. Tong-Chuan-Fa Tzu No. 09843000120, Article 5 of the Full Text corrected and Promulgated by National Communications Commission on Jan 20, 2009

法規內容.條文內容: These standards are prescribed according to Article 70 of Telecommunications Act.
Fee of certificate of registration, revision or due date replacement, or reissuance due to lost or breakage of telecommunication engineer enterprise(s) is NT$ 900 per copy.
Fee of certificate shall be collected while filing the application.

Applicant should pay the Statutory Fee in the form of cash, check issued by bank, treasury check, or draft to the NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION.
The aforementioned check, treasury check or draft should be made payable to the NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION.
These standards shall come into effect as of the date of promulgation.
